mapper.select: select * from t_cart where user_id=#{userId} and product_id=#{productId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_cart ( user_id,product_id,num, product_name,product_price,product_image) values ( #{userId},#{productId},#{num}, #{productName},#{productPrice},#{productImage})
mapper.delete: delete from t_cart where user_id=#{userId} and product_id=#{productId}
